column4: Try again later, or contact the server administrator. why do i get this error?
is that a download you're attempting in a browser, e.g. Firefox?
I think your file is not completing correctly

Try wget? That seems to work pretty well....
Is this your machine or a work machine?
Have you changed any permissions on your system?

I'm wondering if you have a directory that has wrong permissions
